name: A day of the priest
description:
Your tribe's God is getting angry! How could you forget to pray to Him constantly?

You and only you, the tribe's priest, can make the God satisfied.

You should make Him pleased before the God destroys plants and barns full of corn. Grab a sheep and make a sacrifice on the altar!

Every 10 seconds the mood of the God changes: he's happy, sad, angry and punishing. You better not to make him punish you.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - movement
Space - jump
E (hold) - grab the sheep
P - pause

You better hurry because of the changing mood of the God!

Our team:

Game design ckipen
Programmer StupidHobbit
3D art SayuriNyooko

2d art was generated with AI (DreamStudio; neural.love)
Music composed by AIVA - Artificial Intelligence Virtual Artist (https://www.aiva.ai)

The game was made for LudumDare 51 gamejam.
